testcase.name: Cogmento CRM Create a new contact scenario
testcase.system-out: Given user is already on Login page.........................................passed When Title of login page is Cogmento CRM....................................passed Then User enters "lipsita.987@gmail.com" and "indu123$".....................passed Then User clicks on Login button............................................passed Then User is on HomePage....................................................passed Then user moves to new contact page.........................................passed Then user enters contact details "Tom" and "Peter"..........................passed Then Close the browser......................................................passed
